name: Raids & Puzzles
description:
Are you a fan of match-3 puzzles? Do you love building entire cities from scratch? Are RPGs your jam? Then Raids & Puzzles is the perfect game for you!

Become an adventurer and embark on a quest to defeat an ancient evil! Test your wits as you match tiles to defeat monsters! Summon legendary heroes and fight for glory and riches!

Game Features

● Thrilling Match-3 Battles
Classic match-3 battles that require a keen eye and a strategic mind! Unleash hero skills and use elemental strengths and weaknesses to your advantage!

● A Fun Building Experience
Build various buildings and upgrade your castle! Watch your kingdom grow!

● Legendary Heroes Await
Summon powerful heroes and pets to your aid! Train and enhance them to assemble the mightiest team!

● Battle on a Global Server
Join a guild and form alliances with players from all over the world! Team up to take down fearsome bosses, or pit yourselves against other guilds to prove your might!
